trans-unit.source: Defines a configuration element for an announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 定義公告端點的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.AnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.AnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, creates and initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref> class that uses the contract description of the current Discovery protocol version.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫或由衍生類別中覆寫時，會建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref>使用目前 「 探索 」 通訊協定版本的合約描述的類別。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: An announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 公告端點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the WS-Discovery specification that the announcement endpoint supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定公告端點支援的 Ws-discovery 規格版本。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Discovery version.
trans-unit.target: Ws-discovery 版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得公告端點的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 公告端點的型別。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> into an <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的轉換<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>到<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint"> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的服務端點物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum delay a service is required to wait before sending announcement messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務需要傳送公告訊息前等候的延遲上限。

trans-unit.source: Each service must wait for a random period of time to elapse before sending announcement messages.
trans-unit.target: 每個服務必須等候隨機的一段時間，才會傳送公告訊息。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the maximum amount of time (in milliseconds) the service waits.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定的最大時間量 （以毫秒為單位） 的服務在等待。

trans-unit.source: The maximum delay.
trans-unit.target: 延遲上限。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to an announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫或由衍生類別中覆寫時，將轉換指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>為公告端點。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint to which announcement configuration settings are applied.
trans-unit.target: 要套用公告組態設定服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> to an announcement endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫或由衍生類別中覆寫時，將轉換指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>為公告端點。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint to which announcement configuration settings are applied.
trans-unit.target: 要套用公告組態設定服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫或由衍生類別中覆寫時，會初始化並驗證指定的執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The channel endpoint element to initialize and validate.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化及驗證通道端點項目。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden by a derived class, initializes and validates the specified instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫或由衍生類別中覆寫時，會初始化並驗證指定的執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint element to initialize and validate.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化及驗證服務端點項目。

trans-unit.source: When called or overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of the configuration settings contained in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.AnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫或衍生類別中覆寫時，取得集合中所包含之組態設定的<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.AnnouncementEndpointElement"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A collection of configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: 組態設定的集合。
